title: rematch button?
body:
Seriously. We need an after-game "Rematch Request" button.

Same teams, same game mode, just get to select new champs (Or in aram, new random champs ofc).

2015 why has nobody thought of this? It's so enjoyable when you get a close game and then it ends and you think
"Why can't we replay this?"

replies.body: send 9 friend requests and do it then LOL
because what if not everybody wants to have a rematch.

Then they don't be included in the matchmaking for the people who DO want one lol....
It's not a system where all 10 players have to click the button.
It's a system where the people who DO click the button end up having a rematch.
